articles.description: Synapse Interchain Network & L2 Testnet The Synapse Interchain Network(SIN) and the Synapse Chain testnet are live. The SIN is the first PoS bridge and the Synapse Chain serves as the interchain data availability layer for SIN. Swaps Across Cosmos and EVMs
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Synapse Interchain Network & L2 Testnet, Swaps Across Cosmos and EVMs, Trading NFTs on Solana, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: CFTC Issues Orders Against DeFi Protocols, CFTC issued orders against three DeFi protocols for offering digital asset derivatives trading. The orders request "that Opyn, ZeroEx, and Deridex pay civil monetary penalties of $250,000, $200,000, and $100,000, respectively, and cease and desist from violating the Commodity Exchange Act (CEA) and
articles.title: Today in DeFi - CFTC Issues Orders Against DeFi Protocols, Aevo Trading Credit, High-Yield Leveraged Farming, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Avalanche Multiswap Live Multiswap, a multi-asset swap AMM created by CavalRe, is live on Avalanche. Multiswap allows users to concentrate liquidity and swap multiple tokens in a single transaction, with a UX made easy for traders and LPs. Wombat Alpha Cross-chain Pool Live
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Avalanche Multiswap Live, Wombat Alpha Cross-chain Pool, Test out Innovative Options, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: One-tx Leveraged Staking DeFiSaver just released ETH Saver, a new website with one-tx leveraged eth staking, making it easy for users to participate in these strategies. ETHSaver is non custodial and users can choose the lending protocol and LSD they like.
articles.title: Leveraged Staking in one Tx, FloorDAO Rebase Exploit, Switch Debt on Aave, and more

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Raft V2 Live LST-backed stablecoin project Raft launches V2, introducing the 6% R Saving Rate and PSM. Liquis Live Liquis, a liquid governance wrapper for Bunni Pro (liquidity management for Uni V3), is live. Liquis allows users to stake range tokens to earn boosted emissions on Bunni.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Raft V2 Live, Liquis Live, LPing for Airdrop, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Bitcoin ETFs Delayed The SEC delays decisions on spot Bitcoin ETF applications from BlackRock, Bitwise, VanEck, etc. The next deadlines come around mid-October. Kinetix Live on Kava Core Quickswap members launch Kinetix, a 50x leverage perp dex on Kava Chain, initially support $ATOM, $KAVA, $USDT, $axlwBTC, and $axlWETH.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Bitcoin ETFs Delayed, Perp Dex on Kava, Limit and Stop loss orders on chain , and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: StarkWare Unlocks User Funds StarkWare re-enables 550K user funds after an upgrade siloed some funds. The team said the blockage was due to the 0.12.1 version upgrade last week, and users who had not upgraded could not access their accounts. Farcaster Live on OP Mainnet
articles.title: Today in DeFi - StarkWare Unlocks User Funds, Farcaster Live on OP Mainnet, Delta-Hedging Strategy, and More...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Grayscale Wins Lawsuit Against SEC The federal court ruled that the SEC must review its rejection of Grayscale's bid to convert GBTC into an ETF. The 3 judges ruled the SEC failed to explain its disparate treatment of one BTC ETF such that its denial was â€œarbitrary and capriciousâ€.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Grayscale Wins Lawsuit Against SEC, Avocado MultiSig, Delta-Hedged Leverage Farming, and More...

articles.description: Aerodrome Live on Base Aerodrome, a Velodrome fork DEX, is now live on Base. At launch, 40% of the initial Aero token supply will be distributed to veVELO holders as veAERO. Stargate Live on Kava Bridging protocol Stargate has deployed on Kava chain, enabling native USDT access.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Aerodrome Live on Base, Stargate on Kava, zkEVM with Potential Airdrop, and more...

articles.description: Balancer Pool Vulnerability Balancer has received a report of a critical vulnerability that affects some of its V2 pools. Emergency procedures have been executed and â€œover 97% of liquidity initially deemed vulnerable is now safeâ€. â€The vulnerability has not been exploited, however, 0.89% of total TVL ($5.6 million) remains at risk,â€. Users are advised to withdraw from Balancer pools.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Balancer Pool Vulnerability, Aave V3 on Base, Confirmation-Free Perps Trading, and more...

articles.description: Aevo Friend Index Perp Aevo lists FRIEND-PERP, an index perp of Friend Tech. The spot reference is the amount of ETH in the Friend Tech smart contract on Base, converted to dollars at the ETH/USD spot rate, and divided by 1,000,000. Sushi V2 on Base
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Aevo Friend Index Perp, Sushi V2 on Base, Incentivized Lending, and more...

articles.title: Today in DeFi - Connext Token Launching, Scroll Sepolia Live, Concentrated LPing on Arbitrum, and more...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Funds Stuck on Shibarium The Shibarium L2 mainnet went live today. There seem to be some on-chain issues and transactions are stuck on Shibarium, with $1.8M currently locked on ETH. ThorFi Lending Delayed Thorchain devs recommend delaying the launch of ThorFi lending due to a security patch in the works. Thorchain is using a Binance Tss library with a vulnerability to be patched.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Funds Stuck on Shibarium, ThorFi Lending Delayed, Testnet with Potential Airdrop, and more...

articles.title: Today in DeFi - Sei Mainnet Live, Singapore Stablecoin Rules, Farming on crvUSD, and more...
